title: The height of a room in occupancy mentioned at Sr
clause_text: The height of a room in occupancy mentioned at Sr. No.1(e) (ii) of Table15 of Regulation 37, may be permitted for Studio, Museum, Screening Rooms, Multiplex and Auditoria.

source_pdf.text_snippet: The height of a room in occupancy mentioned at Sr. No.1(e) (ii) of Table15 of Regulation 37, may be permitted for Studio, Museum, Screening Rooms, Multiplex and Auditoria.
